mapper.update: update eb_routine_qrcode set third_type = #{thirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, third_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url_time = #{urlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, third_type, third_id, status, add_time, page, qrcode_url, url_time, ctime from eb_routine_qrcode
